title: Knowledge Extraction Response
description: Schema for LLM responses when extracting entities and facts from card content

entities.description: Named entities extracted from the card

description.description: Brief description of what this entity represents

aliases.description: Alternative names or spellings for this entity

confidence.description: Confidence score for this extraction (0.0 to 1.0)

is_new.description: Whether this is a new entity or matches an existing one

existing_entity_name.description: If is_new is false, the name of the existing entity this matches

mention_text.description: The exact text in the card that mentions this entity

facts.description: Facts (relationships or attributes) extracted from the card

subject.description: The entity that is the subject of this fact

object.description: The object of the relationship (entity name or literal value)

object_is_entity.description: Whether the object is another entity (true) or a literal value (false)

object_type.description: If object is a literal, its data type

confidence.description: Confidence score for this fact (0.0 to 1.0)

negated.description: Whether this is a negative assertion (e.g., 'does NOT depend on')

evidence_text.description: The exact text in the card that supports this fact

suggested_domain.description: Suggested domain for new entities if none matches existing domains
